author: andschwa
body: Need to see if this feature is used elsewhere at all. It could be that PowerShell is supported on platforms so old that they don't have string.IsNullOrEmpty... I at least need to check. VSO create date - 9/1/2015 14:34:00     VSO closed date - 9/4/2015 11:03:00
title: monad ModuleIntrinsics.cs: replace string == null || string ==    with string.IsNullOrEmpty()
